com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event

Class EventIndexableGraph<T extends IndexableGraph>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event.EventGraph<T>
      • com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event.EventIndexableGraph<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph, IndexableGraph, WrapperGraph<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventTransactionalIndexableGraph

    public class EventIndexableGraph<T extends IndexableGraph>
extends EventGraph<T>
implements IndexableGraph, WrapperGraph<T>
    EventIndexableGraph is merely a proxy to index methods exposing EventGraph methods in the "evented" way. Like the EventGraph it extends from, this graph implementations raise notifications to the listeners for the following events: new vertex/edge, vertex/edge property changed, vertex/edge property removed, vertex/edge removed.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette
